Welcome To The Best Resort In Lonavala, Pawna Lake

Experience a memorable vacation in Lonavala at Green Velvet Resort, the ultimate hideaway situated in the Sahyadri hills. Conveniently located between Mumbai and Pune, our 3-star luxury resort offers an atmosphere of beauty and peace just a short drive away. Renowned for our lavish amenities and prime location, we're the top choice for weekend getaways and special events alike. Whether it's a leisurely vacation, corporate gathering, or wedding celebration, Green Velvet Resort promises an exceptional experience that will be cherished for a lifetime.

EXPERIENCE NATURE, TRANQUILITY AT
LUXURY GREEN VELVET RESORT IN LONAVALA, PAWNA LAKE

Discover the serene charm of Green Velvet Resort, nestled in the heart of Pawna Lake. Our cosy rooms offer mesmerising views of Pawna Lake, ensuring a delightful stay. Choose from our accommodations, including cottages and villas, designed for your comfort. Unwind by the pool, let the kids play, or explore our lush garden. Indulge in culinary delights at our restaurant and enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi and parking. Experience luxury and joy at Green Velvet Resort; – your Lonavala retreat awaits.

Stay In Pawna

Modern and Spacious Rooms In Lonavala

Experience the feeling of home in one of the most luxurious resorts in Pawna. Every room and every suite in Green Velvet Resort has been designed with the utmost respect for nature, combining high-end comfort with modern amenities. Choose your stay in Lonavala and start your holiday at one of the best resorts in Lonavala.

A/C COTTAGE

3 BHK VILLA



Bejeweled in the lap of nature, Green Velvet in Pawna is the idyllic location for people looking forward to a perfect weekend getaway away from the hustle and bustle of the city life.
